column1: Little Goat Diner////And while I hesitate to call it a true diner
column2: they sure try for it in many ways. The sit down counter
column3: the long window into the kitchen
column4: waitresses in skirts carrying coffee pots
column5: the Heinz bottles on every table
column6: and the cute and colorful laminated menus. It's a wonderful little mish-mash that any diner lover could appreciate.
